title: Faded Dandelion
content:
Faded Dandelion is an item collected with the Gatherer profession. It can be found in Huntsman's Clearing & Mushroom Glade in Episode 2.

Used in the Alchemist skill to make 3 Minute Fear Potion.

Stored in the Potion Reagents Bank in the Apothecary in Hopeport.

Sold to Zeltay Tramagan at the Town Square in Hopeport for 165 copper.
